ygData.msgSnippet: You re using ATI s win2000 drivers?  (but I must say that while I ve found ATI s hardware to be great, the software support definitely is lacking.) ... and ...
ygData.messageBody:
You're using ATI's win2000 drivers? (but I must say that while I've found
ATI's hardware to be great, the software support definitely is lacking.)

> From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>
> What video card(s) are you using?
>
> I have Win2K and EQ on a test machine with an ATI Rage 3d AGP 2X GT-CZUZ
and
> the display is 99% unplayable (constant, very bad, flickering.)
>
> Did you have to do anything to get Direct X 7a installed?
>
> Sylly
>
